Skymouse Studios

A web design studio that helps you build a website you love. No nonsense.

Build a new site. → Maintain a current site. → Speedify your slow site. →
Skymouse helps you tell stories, design better, and develop a brand people love. When people love your brand they give you money.

Everyone and their mother can use photoshop. Anyone can build a Wordpress template. We build beautiful brands that work. There are too many “companies” that make money off mediocrity. It’s our goal to change all that.

What is a Brand?

A brand isn’t just a logo and custom-made coffee mugs. Show your customers that you have exactly what they need. Help them experience your brand. Here's how we can do that together:

Story

There should be a natural flow to every customer’s journey. (Spoiler: You’re in one now.) Is your story a clear aspect of your brand?

Design

Design is how your customers see you. Design should be a visual representation of your story. Don’t use cover-up when you can get a face-lift.

Function

Intuitive. Easy to use. Great services and amazing products mean nothing if people don’t understand your brand. Don’t be a bike with no wheels.

Motion

Audio

Design

Development

Got a project?

We can help. Fill out this quick form. It’s like ad-libs but it actually gets you places. This form shoots an email directly to one of our team members. We’ll then look over your site and your problem, do a little bit of research and get back to you with-in 24 hours.

You also have the option of getting email updates about website, what’s popular and new features that help you reach your customers better. Once-a-month. Every month. It’s like getting a period for designers and non-designers alike, without the cramps!
